name: df-im
body: |- wceq(cim, cmpt(s0, cc, cfv(cre, co(cv(s0), cdiv, ci))))
comment: Define a function whose value is the imaginary part of a complex number. See ~ imval for its value, ~ imcli for its closure, and ~ replim for its use in decomposing a complex number. (Contributed by NM, 9-May-1999.)
